amendment.description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds for Federal Energy Regulatory Commission Order No. 1920.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds appropriated by this Act to enforce Order No. 1920 published by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission relating to regional transmission planning.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 213 (Roll no. 375).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 213 (Roll no. 375).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
